results.content: The class is great to get ahead quickly on what is out so far on Ionic2. Since it is super early, there are many outdated sections which I have commented by adding in what the latest way to write something correctly for the latest beta version to help out the author. I do hope that when the final version comes out for Ionic2 - that this class will be updated with the final release. Thanks so much for the awesome class! Very Helpful

results.content: The teacher gave clear and succinct instructions, there was no wasted time on fluff and theory. This was a good foundational start in Ionic 2. I feel confident in my knowledge going forward in developing Ionic 2 applications. Thank you.

results.content: They seem to have abandon ship.. Yes I have only completed 10% of the course but thats only because is very discouraging to move forward when the code is outdated, course files DO NOT match what's being taugh in the lessons and they have not replied to some students issues since early April.. And most of the replies are not even to help are just bots letting you know that the issue has been resolved. It's not good enough.. this is a big company and should have the resources to assist students.

results.content: This course is powerful and well organized, the framework is awesome, my mind is blowing, I am amazed about the fact of this is cross platform, much easier to develop, have a great performance, easy to test and fast to put the project on the road. The teacher explain the framework and show how he does a great app, this app isn't that simple example that we normally see on introductory courses, this example could certainly be a good app, I am impressed with the performance on my device and with great ideas for apps. This is a totally great course, big teacher and an awesome framework!! Thanks a lot Mathieu to introduce me to this fast and strong way to make beautiful and good apps.

results.content:
This could be a good course but the pace is too fast and it is hard to follow. It is described as an introduction to ionic 2 but material is introduced too quickly. 

Having said that there is a lot of information but it is rarely updated and often out of step. 



Some parts seem disorganised. E.g. after creating the initial app as typescript the sample search page for section 3 is a .js file.  It may be easy to use this but there is no information about it that I could find. In fact the only mention of the file was in lecture 1.

After several months the course content has not been updated.
results.content_html:

Having said that there is a lot of information but it is rarely updated and often out of step.

Some parts seem disorganised. E.g. after creating the initial app as typescript the sample search page for section 3 is a .js file. It may be easy to use this but there is no information about it that I could find. In fact the only mention of the file was in lecture 1.

After several months the course content has not been updated.

results.content:
After spending quite some time getting to grips with Ionic 1 and AngularJS the thought of having to learn the totally new concepts of Ionic2 and Angular2 was quite daunting. 

This course is just what I needed. It's very well structured and presented and covers all of the root concepts required to either start Ionic2 development from scratch or moving from Ionic1 to 2. 

The course covers the major changes to Ionic such as navigation, feature structure and of course ES6 and Typescript.

Highly recommended for anyone who is ready to make the jump!
results.content_html:

Highly recommended for anyone who is ready to make the jump!

It really helped porting my Ionic 1 apps to the new Ionic 2 and decide to start the new ones directly in the latest version of this fantastic framework.
Well done!

results.content:
As a multi-platform mobile developer Ionic 2 gives me the flexibility plus versatility I demand to develop powerful yet under rapid development process apps.
This video-tutorial also covers this objectives, being focused, easy to understand and straight to the point we all want: learn developing powerful and easy to develop/maintain multi-platform mobile apps.
Instructions are clear, with plenty real case scenarios examples and a companion project where implement all issues covered on the course.

In less than 2 hours you'll be developing Ionic 2 sample apps easy to expand into real world powerful multi-platform solutions all thanks to this course.
